name: Saving Harmony
description: It is March 15, 1920 and the town of Nikolayevsk-on-Amur has been overrun by mad men killing and burning everything in sight. You are the last survivor of the Japanese expeditionary force in Siberia. You must fight to survive and in the end find a way to save Harmony.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows XP or higher Memory: 500 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: windows 7 or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
